thread.title: GoPro partners with Huawei as it sets its sights overseas - CNET
thread.title_full: GoPro partners with Huawei as it sets its sights overseas - CNET

author: Zoey Chong
title: GoPro partners with Huawei as it sets its sights overseas - CNET
text:
Español GoPro partners with Huawei as it sets its sights overseas The photography company's Quik photo editing app will be preinstalled into Huawei's new P10 and P10 Plus phones. February 27, 2017 2:34 AM PST Andrew Hoyle/CNET 
Business in the US has been tough for GoPro, so now the company looks to be targeting China. 
On Sunday at Mobile World Congress 2017 in Barcelona, GoPro announced it will integrate an upgraded version of Quik, its photo editing app, into Huawei's new babies, the P10 and the P10 Plus phones, reports Bloomberg . 
Meanwhile, GoPro has struggled in the last year , fighting weak sales and ratcheting back expectations. The company late last year laid off 15 percent of its workforce , and in a separate issue had to recall thousands of its Karma drones , some of which were found to lose power during flight. 
Huawei's dual-camera equipped P10 and P10 Plus are all about the camera. Its photo gallery will include a new "Highlight" feature which will compile photos and videos into a collection complete with backing music. Users are also able to quickly customize the video and share it on social media. Share your voice
